document_data.caption: Duke Llachior Blackthorn
document_data.name: Llachior Blackthorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Llachior Blackthorn''' was the Duke of the Duchy of [[Cape Velen]], and a prominent figure in the court of [[Tethyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: A burly and boisterous man, the duke was missing two fingers from his left hand and walked with a limp after taking serious wounds in a fight with [[Yusuf Jhannivvar|Prince Yusuf Jhannivvar]] in the [[Storm Siege]] of [[Myratma]].
document_data.Personality: He would have preferred adventuring to the reconstruction and planning of Tethyr's economy. He was also described as loud yet kindhearted by those that respected him.
document_data.Activities: Along with his duties as duke and as the royal durbland, Duke Blackthorn was known to personally train the guards of new mints that were started under his reign as the durbland.
document_data.Relationships:
He had a close relationship with the count of [[Firedrake (county)|Firedrake]], [[Ondul Jarduth]]

He was married to the [[Lawantha Silendia]] as the two recuperated from wounds sustained during the First Siege of Myratma.
